Serbian factory – near Novi Sad, northern Serbia

rules.why_relevant_summary: Prevents unauthenticated/public users from reaching any internal systems or data via the AI agent.
rules.compact_rule: IF user.authenticated == false THEN DENY access_to {chatbot_internal, internal_wiki, CRM, project_registry, employee_registry, time_tracking, internal_reports};

rules.why_relevant_summary: Limits any public-facing or unauthenticated chatbot to non-confidential, already-public information.
rules.compact_rule: IF user.authenticated == false THEN ALLOW read_only({company_overview, history, mission, markets, generic_products, public_locations}) AND DENY any access_to {employees, internal_roles, skills_wills, customers, projects, time_entries, internal_process_docs, salaries, HR_notes};

rules.why_relevant_summary: All access control decisions for the AI agent must be based on the authenticated employee identity and system roles.
rules.compact_rule: REQUIRE user.account.employee_id != null AND user.system_roles != null; ALL access_decisions MUST use {employee_id, department, location, system_roles} AS primary ACL inputs; AI_agent MUST NOT escalate roles or spoof employee_id;

rules.why_relevant_summary: Protects confidential employee data such as salary and HR notes; controls what the chatbot can reveal.
Ensures any salary/compensation questions are blocked for non-privileged users with a security outcome code.
rules.compact_rule: IF query.topic IN {"salary", "compensation", "pay", "wage"} AND requester.role NOT IN {HRAdmin, CFO, ManagerOf(target_employee)} THEN RETURN Outcome=denied_security AND DO_NOT_DISCLOSE numerical_values OR ranges;

rules.why_relevant_summary: Restricts who can modify CRM customer data and deal phases; the AI agent must not let others change them.
rules.compact_rule: IF entity IN {CRM.customer, CRM.customer.deal_phase} AND operation IN {CREATE, UPDATE, DELETE} THEN REQUIRE requester.role IN {SalesUser, CustomerServiceUser, SalesManager, CRMAdmin}; ELSE IF operation == READ THEN APPLY standard_read_ACL;

rules.why_relevant_summary: Prevents the chatbot/AI agent from bypassing underlying system permissions when executing actions.
Defines immutability of approved/invoiced time entries and enforces correction workflow.
Prevents project leads (and therefore the AI acting for them) from submitting time for others.
Controls who may change an employee’s skills and wills; important when the AI automates such updates.
rules.compact_rule: IF field IN {employee.skills, employee.wills} AND operation IN {CREATE, UPDATE, DELETE} THEN ALLOW ONLY IF requester.employee_id == target_employee.employee_id OR requester.role IN {ManagerOf(target_employee), HRAdmin, HR}; ELSE DENY;

rules.why_relevant_summary: Prevents sensitive information like individual salaries from being stored in the wiki through AI-generated content.
rules.compact_rule: IF write_target == wiki_page AND new_content CONTAINS {individual_salary_data, highly_confidential_HR_details} THEN DENY write_operation OR REQUIRE explicit_approval_from {HRAdmin, ITAdmin};

rules.why_relevant_summary: Enforces use of canonical systems of record when the AI persists or updates business data.
Ensures all AI-initiated changes are auditable and attributable to a specific employee.
